sn45.7:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn45.7:2.2: Kissa nu kho etaṁ, bhante, adhivacanaṁ:
sn45.7:3.1: Evaṁ vutte, so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn45.7:3.3: Katamaṁ nu kho, bhante, amataṁ, katamo amatagāmimaggo”ti?
sn45.7:3.6: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo amatagāmimaggo, seyyathidaṁ—
